thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 15 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-PBF Logistics Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.50

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-PBF Logistics Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.50
text:
Feb 15 (Reuters) - PBF Logistics Lp:
* PBF LOGISTICS ANNOUNCES MULTI-YEAR GROWTH INITIATIVES, INCREASES QUARTERLY CASH DISTRIBUTION TO $0.4850 PER UNIT AND ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER 2017 EARNINGS RESULTS
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.50 * ANNOUNCES FOUR-YEAR ORGANIC GROWTH PLAN COMPRISED OF MORE THAN $100 MILLION OF EBITDA
* FOUR-YEAR ORGANIC GROWTH PLAN TO BE CONTRIBUTED BY A NUMBER OF PROJECTS ACROSS TERMINALING, STORAGE & PIPELINE SEGMENTS
* PBF LOGISTICS- EXPECT TERMINALING, STORAGE, PIPELINE SEGMENTS PROJECTS TO BE SUPPORTED BY LONG-TERM COMMITMENTS FROM SPONSOR, OTHER THIRD-PARTIES
* QTRLY TOTAL REVENUE $66.5 MILLION VERSUS $61.7 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
